title: More Sri Lankans arrested in ongoing human trafficking operation
content: (Thailand) Chonburi Immigration police arrested another group of Sri Lankans using Thailand as a transit point in a human trafficking ring. Officers raided the Prima Place Hotel and an unnamed restaurant across the street from the inn, arresting Sankha Mihiruk Kumarasinghe, 31; Pradeep Chaminda Kumara Kuruppu Arachchilage, 30; Gayan Tharanga Wijerathne Rsaekanayake Wijerathne Mudiyanselage, 31;…
